channel.title: Role Model on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Role Model on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: day #21
item.description: today is my mom’s birthday. she’s 29 & holding. if there is anyone in this world who exhibits obvious passion in her life, it’s my mom. mom loves teaching, as well as the kids in her class. when i call her to catch up, i am always an audience to her stories of their successes or tragedies — but most often their successes, since she believes so much in them.
